definition: to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: The ultrasonic hardness tester is an versatile nondestructive tester.
sentences.chinese: 超声硬度计是一种普适的无损测试仪器。

sentences.english: Hardness was quiet different in different zone of fusion welding joint.
sentences.chinese: 熔焊接头硬度分布不均匀，热影响区是薄弱环节。

sentences.english: The 'softness' or 'hardness' of rubber compounds is varied for each race according to the known characteristics of the track.
sentences.chinese: 根据各赛道不同的特性，轮胎橡胶的硬度也不相同。

sentences.english: It has good characters of high hardness, good wear resistance, hard to form crescent depression etc.
sentences.chinese: 硬度高，耐磨性好，抗月牙洼能力强。

sentences.english: There was no positive correlation between seed hardness and aril size.
sentences.chinese: 种子硬度与籽粒大小的相关性不显著。

sentences.english: Superimposing of parts forms a laminate which increases the rigidity and solidity of the panel.
sentences.chinese: 重叠的部分形成了一个薄板增加面板的硬度和坚固度。

sentences.english: Bucket cutting edges of abrasive-resistant steel of up to 500 Brinell.
sentences.chinese: 铲斗切削刀刃为抗磨料磨损钢材，布氏硬度达500。

sentences.english: The hardness of the films was measured by an indentation method.
sentences.chinese: 由压痕法测得的膜的硬度。

sentences.english: Then I lay down again, feeling the cobbles harder than ever against my chest.
sentences.chinese: 然后再趴下，胸前石子儿的硬度更胜从前。

sentences.english: On the basis of the microhardness variation, the HAZ is divided into five subregions .
sentences.chinese: 根据显微硬度的变化，将焊接HAZ分为五个区段。

sentences.english: Two see hardness, scratch resistance, protective paint for wood work.
sentences.chinese: 二看硬度，耐划伤，保护木器漆历久弥新。

sentences.english: Cemented carbide alloys are a material having hardness and high toughness.
sentences.chinese: 超硬合金是具有硬度和高韧性的材料。

sentences.english: Brinell hardness will be 223 maximum with a spheroidized structure.
sentences.chinese: 布氏硬度最大将达到223，具有球化结构。

sentences.english: Generally, an uncured specimen has a hardness reading below normal.
sentences.chinese: 通常，未处理的样品的硬度读数会低于正常值。

sentences.english: So improve autoloading of Rockwell hardness method of measurement.
sentences.chinese: 因此提出了自动加载的洛氏硬度测量方法。

sentences.english: Improve the testing equipment, magnetic detection machines and hardness.
sentences.chinese: 检验设备完善，有磁粉探伤机和硬度计。

definition: texture of timber/quality of material/material (that sth is made of)
